problem_names: lemma NS_O_NS[order_simps]: "NS O NS = NS" "NS O NS O T = NS O T"
lemma S_O_S: "S O S \<subseteq> S" "S O S O T \<subseteq> S O T"
lemma trans_S_point: "\<And> x y z. (x, y) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (y, z) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S"
lemma trans_NS_point: "\<And> x y z. (x, y) \<in> NS \<Longrightarrow> (y, z) \<in> NS \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> NS"
lemma compat_NS_S_point: "\<And> x y z. (x, y) \<in> NS \<Longrightarrow> (y, z) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S"
lemma compat_S_NS_point: "\<And> x y z. (x, y) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (y, z) \<in> NS \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S"
lemma S_O_rtrancl_NS[order_simps]: "S O NS\<^sup>* = S" "S O NS\<^sup>* O T = S O T"
lemma rtrancl_NS_O_S[order_simps]: "NS\<^sup>* O S = S" "NS\<^sup>* O S O T = S O T"
lemma S_O_NS[order_simps]: "S O NS = S" "S O NS O T = S O T"
lemma NS_O_S[order_simps]: "NS O S = S" "NS O S O T = S O T"

lemma compat_rtrancl:
  assumes ab: "(a, b) \<in> S"
    and bc: "(b, c) \<in> (NS \<union> S)\<^sup>*"
  shows "(a, c) \<in> S"
translations: lemma refl_NS_point: "(s, s) \<in> NS"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (s, s) \<in> NS
using refl_NS

proof (prove)
using this:
  refl NS

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (s, s) \<in> NS
unfolding refl_on_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  NS \<subseteq> UNIV \<times> UNIV \<and>
  (\<forall>x\<in>UNIV. (x, x) \<in> NS)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (s, s) \<in> NS
by blast
lemma NS_O_NS[order_simps]: "NS O NS = NS" "NS O NS O T = NS O T"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NS O NS = NS &&& NS O NS O T = NS O T
proof -

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. NS O NS = NS
 2. NS O NS O T = NS O T
show "NS O NS = NS"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NS O NS = NS
by(fact trans_refl_imp_O_id[OF trans_NS refl_NS])

proof (state)
this:
  NS O NS = NS

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NS O NS O T = NS O T
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  NS O NS = NS
show "NS O NS O T = NS O T"

proof (prove)
using this:
  NS O NS = NS

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NS O NS O T = NS O T
by fast

proof (state)
this:
  NS O NS O T = NS O T

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma trancl_NS[order_simps]: "NS\<^sup>+ = NS"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NS\<^sup>+ = NS
using trans_NS

proof (prove)
using this:
  trans NS

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NS\<^sup>+ = NS
by simp
lemma rtrancl_NS[order_simps]: "NS\<^sup>* = NS"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NS\<^sup>* = NS
by (rule trans_refl_imp_rtrancl_id[OF trans_NS refl_NS])
lemma trancl_S[order_simps]: "S\<^sup>+ = S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):

using trans_S

proof (prove)
using this:
  trans S

goal (1 subgoal):

by simp

proof (state)

lemma trans_S_point: "\<And> x y z. (x, y) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (y, z) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> S; (y, z) \<in> S\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S
using trans_S

proof (prove)
using this:
  trans S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> S; (y, z) \<in> S\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S
unfolding trans_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x y z.
     (x, y) \<in> S \<longrightarrow>
     (y, z) \<in> S \<longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> S; (y, z) \<in> S\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S
by blast

proof (prove)
using this:
  trans NS

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> NS; (y, z) \<in> NS\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> NS
unfolding trans_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x y z.
     (x, y) \<in> NS \<longrightarrow>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> NS; (y, z) \<in> NS\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> NS
by blast
end

locale compat_pair = 
  fixes S NS :: "'a rel" 
  assumes compat_NS_S: "NS O S \<subseteq> S"
    and compat_S_NS: "S O NS \<subseteq> S"
begin
lemma compat_NS_S_point: "\<And> x y z. (x, y) \<in> NS \<Longrightarrow> (y, z) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> NS; (y, z) \<in> S\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S
using compat_NS_S

proof (prove)
using this:
  NS O S \<subseteq> S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> NS; (y, z) \<in> S\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S
by blast
lemma compat_S_NS_point: "\<And> x y z. (x, y) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (y, z) \<in> NS \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> S; (y, z) \<in> NS\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S
using compat_S_NS

proof (prove)
using this:
  S O NS \<subseteq> S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y z.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> S; (y, z) \<in> NS\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> S
by blast
lemma S_O_rtrancl_NS[order_simps]: "S O NS\<^sup>* = S" "S O NS\<^sup>* O T = S O T"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S O NS\<^sup>* = S &&& S O NS\<^sup>* O T = S O T
proof -

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. S O NS\<^sup>* = S
 2. S O NS\<^sup>* O T = S O T
show "S O NS\<^sup>* = S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S O NS\<^sup>* = S
proof(intro equalityI subrelI)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>* \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
 2. \<And>x y. (x, y) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>*
fix x y

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>* \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
 2. \<And>x y. (x, y) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>*
assume "(x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>*"

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>*

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>* \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
 2. \<And>x y. (x, y) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>*
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>*
obtain n where "(x, y) \<in> S O NS^^n"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>*

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>n.
        (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>* \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
 2. \<And>x y. (x, y) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>*
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n
show "(x, y) \<in> S"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> S
proof(induct n arbitrary: y)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>y. (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ 0 \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
 2. \<And>n y.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y.
                   (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow>
                   (x, y) \<in> S;
        (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ Suc n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
case 0

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ 0

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>y. (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ 0 \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
 2. \<And>n y.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y.
                   (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow>
                   (x, y) \<in> S;
        (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ Suc n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ 0
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> S
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n y.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y.
                   (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow>
                   (x, y) \<in> S;
        (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ Suc n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n y.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y.
                   (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow>
                   (x, y) \<in> S;
        (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ Suc n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
case IH: (Suc n)

proof (state)
this:
  (x, ?y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow> (x, ?y) \<in> S
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ Suc n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n y.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y.
                   (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow>
                   (x, y) \<in> S;
        (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ Suc n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (x, ?y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow> (x, ?y) \<in> S
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ Suc n
obtain z where xz: "(x, z) \<in> S O NS^^n" and zy: "(z, y) \<in> NS"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, ?y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow> (x, ?y) \<in> S
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ Suc n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z.
        \<lbrakk>(x, z) \<in> S O NS ^^ n; (z, y) \<in> NS\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (x, z) \<in> S O NS ^^ n
  (z, y) \<in> NS

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n y.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y.
                   (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow>
                   (x, y) \<in> S;
        (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ Suc n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
from IH.hyps[OF xz] zy

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (x, z) \<in> S
  (z, y) \<in> NS
have "(x, y) \<in> S O NS"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, z) \<in> S
  (z, y) \<in> NS

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> S O NS
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n y.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y.
                   (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ n \<Longrightarrow>
                   (x, y) \<in> S;
        (x, y) \<in> S O NS ^^ Suc n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S
with compat_S_NS

proof (chain)
picking this:
  S O NS \<subseteq> S
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  S O NS \<subseteq> S
  (x, y) \<in> S O NS

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> S
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> S

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y. (x, y) \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> S O NS\<^sup>*
qed auto

proof (state)
this:
  S O NS\<^sup>* = S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S O NS\<^sup>* O T = S O T
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  S O NS\<^sup>* = S
show "S O NS\<^sup>* O T = S O T"

proof (prove)
using this:
  S O NS\<^sup>* = S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S O NS\<^sup>* O T = S O T
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  S O NS\<^sup>* O T = S O T

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

locale order_pair = pre_order_pair S NS + compat_pair S NS 
  for S NS :: "'a rel"
begin
lemma S_O_NS[order_simps]: "S O NS = S" "S O NS O T = S O T"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S O NS = S &&& S O NS O T = S O T
by (fact S_O_rtrancl_NS[unfolded rtrancl_NS])+
lemma NS_O_S[order_simps]: "NS O S = S" "NS O S O T = S O T"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NS O S = S &&& NS O S O T = S O T
by (fact rtrancl_NS_O_S[unfolded rtrancl_NS])+

locale SN_ars =
  fixes S :: "'a rel"
  assumes SN: "SN S"
locale SN_pair = compat_pair S NS + SN_ars S for S NS :: "'a rel"
locale SN_order_pair = order_pair S NS + SN_ars S for S NS :: "'a rel"
sublocale SN_order_pair \<subseteq> SN_pair

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. SN_pair S NS
end
